h2_title: Where To Use The Spirit of Captain Lotus-Vision in Black Myth: Wukong
content: The Spirit of Captain Lotus Vision isn't used. Instead, possession of it will cause the purple-sealed gates within the Pagoda Realm to unlock, allowing you to enter them to find secrets, gear, enemies, and even Ashen Slumber, one of the Transformation Spells.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Spirit_of_Captain_Lotus-Vision.md', within the main section titled 'The Spirit of Captain Lotus-Vision', specifically from the subsection 'Where To Use The Spirit of Captain Lotus-Vision in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
The Spirit of Captain Lotus Vision isn't used. Instead, possession of it will cause the purple-sealed gates within the Pagoda Realm to unlock, allowing you to enter them to find secrets, gear, enemies, and even Ashen Slumber, one of the Transformation Spells.
